title: Partly Artificial Data on the U. S. Economy
description:
Description
These are partly contrived data from Kmenta (1986), constructed
to illustrate estimation of a simultaneous-equation model.
The Kmenta data frame has 20 rows and 5 columns.
reference:
The exogenous variables D, F, and A are based on
real data; the endogenous variables P and Q were generated
by simulation.

parameters.F:
ratio of preceding year's prices received by farmers
to general consumer prices.
parameters.P: ratio of food prices to general consumer prices.

format: This data frame contains the following columns:
